docs.title: Who am I
docs.text: Howdy, my name is Jonh09, i've been part of the AllTheMods community for a while. Im all about learning new things, and also helping people. I've been a newbie, like you are/were, so my objective is to try to help as many people as I can, and learn along the way.

docs.title: What's this
docs.text:
Inspired by the AllTheGuides page (Official guides page for AllTheMods), i've had the idea to make a page where I would share my small guides/tutorials or just my way of doing something. This page consists of pretty much all the small guides / setups i've made and stuff I taught. Do note that none of these may be the most excellent and outstanding setups possible, it's just my take/view on how to do it.

If you find any errors or have any suggestions, you can : * find me in the AllTheMods Discord @Jonh09, * or ask on this project's Github -> Guide discussions.
